subject: [plant-fur] docs: create auto-maintained documentation folder
body:
Add docs folder with empty templates for:
- ai-fuckups.md: Log of AI mistakes and lessons learned
- style-guidelines.md: Project conventions and standards
- userflows.md: User workflows and use cases
- user-guidelines.md: Tips and best practices

Update CLAUDE.md with instructions for keeping these files
automatically up to date.
title: [plant-fur] docs: create auto-maintained documentation folder
